projects.name: UFOSC Website
projects.description: The club website for the University of Florida Open Source Club.

projects.name: Personal Site
projects.description: The personal site for Dakota Rennemann.

projects.name: STEM+C Blockly
projects.description: An application that allows students to program arduino boards from the web browser using blocks and not requiring any extra downloads.

projects.name: Albot and Albota
projects.description: A bot that handles basic automation and includes fun interactions built for the University of Florida Open Source Club discord server.

projects.name: Tournament Tracker
projects.description: This project was built to act as a basic tournament tracker where teams could be assigned brackets.

projects.name: Virtual Filesystem
projects.description: Allows a user to mount a virtual file system given a file in .WAD format.

projects.name: Perspecta Training Software
projects.description: Software meant to help members of the Air Force detect nuclear explosions. Also includes full training for the aforementioned systems.

projects.name: CEN3031 Bootcamps
projects.description: A set of bootcamps designed to teach students in the class CEN 3031 at the University of Florida the MERN stack of technologies.

projects.name: CEN3031 Project Showcase
projects.description: A website meant to showcase final student projects from teh class CEN 3031 at the Univerity of Florida.
